channel.title: CVE Feed for propertyhive -- PropertyHive
channel.description: The latest CVEs for propertyhive -- PropertyHive

item.title: CVE-2024-35701|2024-06-08T14:16:12.660Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PropertyHive allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PropertyHive: from n/a through 2.0.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-3607|2024-05-02T16:52:44.991Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: The PropertyHive plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the delete_key_date() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary posts

item.title: CVE-2024-34381|2024-06-06T18:30:08.022Z -- propertyhive -- propertyhive
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PropertyHive allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PropertyHive: from n/a through 2.0.10.
